g.name: Name: Glycine metabolism, including IMDs Organism: Homo sapiens
~ 72% of patients had a mutation in GLDC, 24% in AMT, and 4 % is called :variant NKH. (1 patient presented a mutation in GCSH).

text.tspan: ~ 72% of patients had a mutation in GLDC,
24% in AMT, and 4 % is called :variant NKH.
(1 patient presented a mutation in GCSH).

g.name: PNPOD affects the availability of pyridoxal-P, therefore having a secondary effect on the activity of the P-protein from the glycine cleavage system.

text.tspan: PNPOD affects the availability of pyridoxal-P,
therefore having a secondary effect on the activity
of the P-protein from the glycine cleavage system.
